long:
Meaning: a "rib" (as curved), literally (of the body) or figuratively (of a door, i.e. leaf); hence, a "side", literally (of a person) or figuratively (of an object or the sky, i.e. quarter); architecturally, "a" (especially floor or ceiling) "timber" or "plank" (single or collective, i.e. a flooring).
Usage: beam, board, chamber, corner, leaf, plank, rib, side (chamber).
Source: or (feminine) "צַלְעָה"; from "H6760";
